name: vizzybility
overview:
Vizzybility helps people increase their professional visibility, credibility, and competitiveness.

Vizzybility lets people showcase their skills, expertise, and professional achievements, and receive endorsements and kudos from their connections. They can also receive badges for their professional behavior such as “hard working”, “dedicated”, “team spirited” from their connections. Vizzybility provides an easy way to capture the positive feedback from the professional network. People can also compare their skills to others in the industry to see how they stack up. They can find missing skills or identifying new skills to learn. This helps them stay competitive. They can take skill quizzes and get on the leaderboard and can join skill groups, or attend skill events in their area to learn new skills.
